products.title: Splash Mushroom Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-vtb1468 fabric colour: mushroom brown material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash mushroom brown 89mm vertical blind in brown.

products.title: Splash Beige 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured vertical blind will make a wonderful addition to any room and will compliment wooden tones thoughout the home. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Beige Vertical Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash beige vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Splash Beige
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
